name: Sunrise Nonagram
description:
A low-poly cinematic adventure game set in a tecno-fantastical world impacted by your choices

Now available in English and Spanish

Description:

In order to bring a new sunrise to a clouded future, you must learn from the past that once was. But that past lays as clouded in darkness as your present, and it is only the symbol of a nine-pointed star that may shed light upon it.

Experience the tale of a village's fall and rise, choose what paths to walk and unravel its nine endings. Learn from its lessons to decipher the mysteries of the Sunrise Nonagram.

Originally based on a short text-based adventure that I made as my first C# programming project, Sunrise Nonagram attempts to adapt the spirit of a choose-your-own-adventure game to a fully animated 3D setting, combining it with elements of Telltale-style games and RPGs.

Features:
  • A short story defined by your decisions... and more to discover outside of it.
  • Character customization, including different body types, hair styles, hair colors and skin tones.
  • Player-driven dialogue.
  • Simple controls that let you explore at your own pace.
  • Minimized interfaces and quest markings, integrating them into the game's world and dialogues whenever possible.
  • 9 possible endings, each granting you an ability outside of the main game's story (PS: I may expand upon these abilities and this entire section of the game in the future).
  • Secrets to uncover!
Tell the tale of your own glistening: Preserve nature's balance, embrace the complexity of machinery, discover the secrets of ancient magic or walk all paths in search of the world's truth

Developed by Goethio Zafiro using the Unity game engine. All assets employed, including music, were created by Goethio Zafiro.

*This is the first full game that I ever release, so some bugs may be present. If you encounter any, I'd appreciate it if you reach out to me so I can try to address them!
